name: smartech-rn-integrator
description: Smartech SDK Integrator desktop and web app
author: Netcore

scripts.dev:desktop: npm --workspace @smartech/shared run build && npm --workspace @smartech/engine run build && concurrently -k "npm run dev:web" "npm --workspace apps/desktop run dev"
scripts.start:desktop: npm --workspace @smartech/shared run build && npm --workspace @smartech/engine run build && npm --workspace apps/web run build && npm --workspace apps/desktop run start
scripts.pack:desktop: npm --workspace @smartech/shared run build && npm --workspace @smartech/engine run build && npm --workspace apps/web run build && npm --workspace apps/desktop run pack
scripts.build:desktop: npm --workspace @smartech/shared run build && npm --workspace @smartech/engine run build && npm --workspace apps/web run build && npm --workspace apps/desktop run dist
scripts.build:desktop:github: npm --workspace @smartech/shared run build && npm --workspace @smartech/engine run build && npm --workspace apps/web run build && npm --workspace apps/desktop run dist:github
scripts.publish:desktop:github: npm --workspace @smartech/shared run build && npm --workspace @smartech/engine run build && npm --workspace apps/web run build && npm --workspace apps/desktop run publish:github
scripts.build: npm --workspace apps/web run build && npm --workspace apps/server run build
scripts.typecheck: npm --workspace apps/web run typecheck && npm --workspace packages/engine run typecheck
